ville: langlais Ã©tant la langue de travail. Sanofi is looking for an experienced Cyber Security Operations Center (SOC) analyst. This is an opportunity to work in a state of the art SOC with cutting edge cyber security technologies and work alongside other experienced and knowledgeable experts. Sanofi takes cyber security very seriously and ensures that SOC analysts are provided the right tools and training to be able to respond to unexpected and complex attack strategies. This is a great opportunity to expand your knowledge
column7: experience and career. The Sanofi SOC is global and responsible to monitor
column8: detect and respond to any possible cyber attack.The SOC analyst needs to be an expert in cyber security. He/She must have expertise in forensics across various operating systems and technologies. He/She is responsible for developing new detection and response capabilities. The SOC analyst will be a highly competent computer scientist
column9: capable of improving existing processes and technologies and developing brand new strategies and technologies. The SOC analyst must also be knowledgeable and respectful of all relevant legal and compliance requirements. The goal is to ensure that Sanofi has highly competent cyber security experts to lead and puzzle out any attacks we might face.The SOC analyst will ensure that appropriate forensics information is gathered from each incident engagement. Root cause analysis will be completed to ensure we learn from each incident and improve our detection and protection capabilities. The SOC analyst is the expert who can identify security gaps
column10: missing controls and detection strategies. The Analyst ensures risk reduction by developing rapid response strategies
column11: expanding protection capabilities and improving the time to remediation so that dangerous security situations are quickly and effectively resolved.Profile:Formal Education and Experience Required:University/Masterâ\x80\x99s Degree in Computer Science
column12: preferably in Information Security.Real world SOC or forensics experience.Computer Programming skills
column13: especially in Python.10 years of professional experience in IS/IT
column14: of which 5 years is in IS/IT Security.Security Certifications like CISSP or CEH.Expertise and Competencies:The candidate should have significant expertise in common operating systems like Windows
column15: MAC and Linux. As a SOC analyst
column16: expertise in understanding how these systems can be attacked
column17: defended and forensically investigated in important. Basic understanding of computer networks
column18: firewalls
column19: intrusion prevention technologies
column20: and Antivirus technologies is necessary. Real world experience working with these technologies is expected. Expertise as a red team penetration tester or a blue team system defender would be preferred. Candidates should also have some experience with Security Information Event Management (SIEM) systems and Event Detection and Response (EDR) technology.Basic scripting skills in Python
column21: Powershell and Visual Basic would be expected. More advanced programming skills are not required but would add strongly to the profile.Leadership and strong communication skills are required to lead small teams in times of crises and to provide efficient communications around risk and threat levels. A good ability to translate complex technical stories into non-technical language is necessary. Candidates should also be capable of determining the confidentiality level of topics and ensuring that confidential data is treated appropriately and not leaked or exposed. Candidates should work well with others and have strong listening skills.Candidates should have experience working globally across cultures and organizational levels. They should be aware and have working knowledge of international privacy and regulatory requirements for industry in general and for the Pharmaceutical industry specifically.Finally
column22: the SOC analyst should be able to function with a high level of autonomy. They should be willing to take on responsibility
column23: take initiative and ensure tasks are completed efficiently and thoroughly. They should be appropriately assertive and ensure strong rigor in how they treat each subject.Mastery of English is required.Sanofi is committed to welcoming and integrating people with disabilities.At Sanofi diversity and inclusion is foundational to how we operate and embedded in our Core Values. We recognize to truly tap into the richness diversity brings we must lead with inclusion and have a workplace where those differences can thrive and be leveraged to empower the lives of our colleagues
